text: Old Gringo is a 1989 American romantic adventure movie directed by Luis Puenzo and was based on the novel of the same name by Carlos Fuentes. It stars Gregory Peck, Jane Fonda, Jimmy Smits, Patricio Contreras, Jenny Gago, Gabriela Roel and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was a box office failure. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1989 romance movies Category:1989 adventure movies Category:American romance movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Luis Puenzo
title: Old Gringo
